title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart

This garden cart is made with strong steel mesh frame in green color. It is designed for daily yard work, farm use, or moving tools and materials.

Main features:
- Capacity: up to 400 lb. Bed volume about 3 cubic feet.
- Bed size: 34 inches length x 18 inches width.
- Overall height: 37 inches. Cart weight: 36.6 pounds.
- Wheels: 4-wheel design with 10-inch pneumatic tires for better grip and softer ride on grass, soil, and gravel.
- Maneuverability: tight turn radius and ample ground clearance to pass over small obstacles.
- Side panels: removable. You can take them off to carry larger or odd-shape items.
- Convertible: quickly change to a flatbed cart for wide loads like lumber, bags of soil, or stones.
- Handle: straight pull handle for simple control by hand.
- Assembly: quick assembly with basic steps and common tools.
- Warranty: 1-year limited warranty.

Use examples:
- Move mulch bags, soil, firewood, stones.
- Carry tools, pots, or plants around garden.
- Transport feed or supplies in small farm.

Notes:
- Steel mesh bed is durable and allows dirt and water to fall through.
- Pneumatic tires need air; check pressure for best performance.
- For safety, do not exceed 400 lb capacity and secure loose items when moving.

This cart is a practical choice if you need a strong, simple, and easy-to-move garden cart that can also work as a flatbed when needed.
